mapper.insert: insert into m_user (ID, IDENTITY_NO, REAL_NAME, NICK_NAME, LOGIN_NAME, SALT, PASSWORD, MOBILE, SEX, BIRTHDAY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, SOURCE, STATUS, FLG_FREEZE, FLG_DELETED, FLG_AUTH_REALNAME) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{identityNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{source,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{flgFreeze,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{flgDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{flgAuthRealname,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update m_user set IDENTITY_NO = #{identityNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REAL_NAME = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NICK_NAME = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALT = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SOURCE = #{source,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FLG_FREEZE = #{flgFreeze,jdbcType=TINYINT}, FLG_DELETED = #{flgDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, FLG_AUTH_REALNAME = #{flgAuthRealname,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, IDENTITY_NO, REAL_NAME, NICK_NAME, LOGIN_NAME, SALT, PASSWORD, MOBILE, SEX, BIRTHDAY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, SOURCE, STATUS, FLG_FREEZE, FLG_DELETED, FLG_AUTH_REALNAME from m_user where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select ID, IDENTITY_NO, REAL_NAME, NICK_NAME, LOGIN_NAME, SALT, PASSWORD, MOBILE, SEX, BIRTHDAY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, SOURCE, STATUS, FLG_FREEZE, FLG_DELETED, FLG_AUTH_REALNAME from m_user
